name: Here, kitty, kitty
description:
A space ship has crashed on top of a tree, its crew is a group of alien cat-like creatures that only want to go back home. An alien hunter comes to the crash site and seeks to shoot the aliens down to earth where he can grab them.

4 local players compete 1 vs. 3, the first player controls the alien hunter and the other 3 control the cats. 

At least 2 gamepads are necessary to play the game.
